group.name: paymentsense_remotepayments
group.string: Payment status is unknown because of a communication error or unknown/unsupported payment status. Status Code @statusCode; Message: @gatewayMessage
Access token is empty. Please contact customer support.
An error has occurred. (cURL Error No: @curlErrorNumber, cURL Error Message: @curlErrorMessage, HTTP Code: @httpCode).
Curl not enabled. Please enable curl.
An unexpected error has occurred. Please contact customer support.
The Paymentsense - Remote Payments payment method is not configured.
Payment status is unknown. Please contact customer support and do not retry the payment for this order unless you are instructed to do so.
